name: flock-community-flock-skills
description: Skills for coding agents to deliver Flock-quality software projects.

plugins.name: flock-skills
plugins.description: 7 spec commands (/spec, /spec-init, /spec-review, /spec-deepen, /spec-reverse, /spec-refactor, /spec-status) for creating, validating, and maintaining typed specifications with progressive integration from single files to code-linked systems.
